title: Homemade Chex Mix
directions: Combine olive oil, Worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, and garlic powder in the bottom of a large bowl.
Add goldfish, nuts, and pretzels to bag of Crispix. Add mixture of dry ingredients to large bowl, and toss with hands to cover evenly in olive oil mixture.
Pour into a 9 x 13 or jelly-roll pan. Bake at four 15-minute intervals, stirring between each. . Let cool before storing in an air-tight container
ingredients: 1 box rice, corn, or wheat cereal, such as Crispix or Chex (I usually buy whatever’s on sale)
1 cup pecans (or nut of your choice)
